name: Fourfold
description:
Made for the JS13K game jam.

An abstract puzzle game, navigate your way through the missing platforms.

Source: https://github.com/rottencandy/js13k2020

Controls:

Move - Arrows/WASD/ZQSD

In level editor - to cycle through platforms

Multiple themes are available, accessible through pause menu (Touch controls can also be enabled in the pause menu)

Web Monetization exclusives:

- Extra themes

- Extra platform in level editor
